title: Projects
planetariumExplanation: Displays images and descriptions from A Picture Of the Day and Mars Rover ordening the images by their different cameras. Hosted in Vercel.
chatRoomExplanation: A page created with a client (hosted in Vercel) and a server (hosted in Heroku) to login with username and chat in realtime using Socket.io.
contactsCalendarExplanation: A page created to login (user and password) and save your contacts info (name, birthday, phone number and email) in a database. Hosted in Heroku.
